channel.title: Phosphate Starvation Response on funPlantGenes
channel.description: Recent content in Phosphate Starvation Response on funPlantGenes

item.title: BnCBL1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnCBL1 Gene Name: Calcineurin B-Like 1 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: A CBL-interacting protein kinase (CIPK) gene, BnCIPK6, was isolated in Brassica napus.

item.title: BnCIPK6
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnCIPK6 Gene Name: CBL-interacting protein kinase 6 Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: A CBL-interacting protein kinase (CIPK) gene, BnCIPK6, was isolated in Brassica napus.

item.title: CsPHL3
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Cs2g01480.1 Gene Symbol: CsPHL3 Gene Name: Citrus Phosphate Starvation Response Factor 3 Genome: Species: Citrus sinensis Functional Descriptions: CsPHL3 could directly represses the expression of PSY, thus resulting in a reduction of carotenoid contents, which may release less amounts of SLs and ultimately suppress Pi signaling.

item.title: CsPPSR1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Csa3G009550 Gene Symbol: CsPPSR1 Gene Name: Phloem Phosphate Stress-Repressed 1 Genome: Species: Cucumis sativus Functional Descriptions: A cucumber protein, Phloem Phosphate Stress-Repressed 1(CsPPSR1), rapidly degrades in response to a phosphate stress.

item.title: GmPHR25
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.15g123100 Gene Symbol: GmPHR25 Gene Name: PHOSPHATE STARVATION RESPONSE 25 Genome: Wm82.

item.title: GmPTF1
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.19g143900 Gene Symbol: GmPTF1 Gene Name: Genome: Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: GmPTF1 modifies root architecture responses to phosphate starvation primarily through regulating GmEXPB2 expression in soybean.
